text: Annabi Munsa naxa a kɔn naxaba, a naxa a wuli nde tongo, a a maso sɛrɛxɛbade ferie ma naxee nu na sɛrɛxɛbade tunxunyi naani ra. A naxa na raba a bɛlɛxɛsole ra, alako a xa sɛrɛxɛbade rasɛniyɛn. A naxa wuli dɔnxɔɛ ifili sɛrɛxɛbade sɛɛtie ma. A sɛrɛxɛbade rasɛniyɛn na ki nɛ barima a findi xunsarade nan na.
